newsitem.title: FRANCE: Globe Air appointed gsa for Sudan's United Arabian.
newsitem.headline: Globe Air appointed gsa for Sudan's United Arabian.

text.p: Globe Air Cargo, said it had been appointed French cargo sales agent, for Sudan-based airline, United Arabian Airlines, effective December 1.
"The airline operates a twice-weekly Boeing 707 freighter flight between Ostend and Khartoum," Globe Air President, Guy Tordjman, told Reuters.
Globe Air operates road feeder services from Paris serving the flight, Tordjman said.
Globe Air was recently appointed French cargo sales agent for Colombian airline, Avianca which operates a three times weekly Boeing 767 passenger service between Paris and Bogota.

The gsa's other airline customers include Air China, Air Malta, Biman Bangla Desh, COPA, Ethiopian Airlines, Royal Nepal Airlines, USAir and Vietnam Airlines. Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44-171-542-7706 Fax+44-171-542-5017
